description: ODEX AA. A decentralized exchange for trading tokens issued on Obyte.

field_descriptions.withdraw: Command to withdraw funds. Set the value to 1.
field_descriptions.asset: ID of asset you want to withdraw (44 characters).
field_descriptions.amount: The amount you want to withdraw.
field_descriptions.to: The address to deposit to or withdraw from (if different from your address).
field_descriptions.cancel: Command to cancel an order. Set the value to 1.
field_descriptions.revoke: Command to revoke trading authorization from an address. Set the value to 1.
field_descriptions.grant: Command to grant trading authorization to an address. Set the value to 1.
field_descriptions.address: The address whose trading authorization is to be granted or revoked.
field_descriptions.matcher_fee1: Matcher fee to be charged from the author of order1 if it is lower than the default
field_descriptions.matcher_fee2: Matcher fee to be charged from the author of order2 if it is lower than the default
